name: holofuel-gui
description: Simple and intuitive interface allowing users to transact with HoloFuel.

scripts.start-dna-agent2: cd ./holofuel && HC_N3H_PATH=~/n3h HC_AGENT=testAgent2 HC_N3H_BOOTSTRAP_NODE=wss://192.168.0.7:39645/?a=hkYZfJCBS-CVuuHl7gn9J_GXcwfQemn4MGoH8_dL84ebwpF6baH6THAbC5_LQpnSagIkCNTtaQszjhEBN4TYlp9bouAQVuwQ HC_N3H_IPC_URI=wss://127.0.0.1:40733/ hc run --logging --port 3100
